title: scholarship and UBI bank account
content: Is an account in UBI bank compulsory for scholarship? Will the scholarship amount be deposited directly from college to account ?

comments.body: Just the account no. and IFSC code is what they have asked

Top 20% will get scholarship. In that 20%, 5% gets CNR scholarship and rest 15% gets MRD scholarship. The MRD one refunds 20% of the sem fees that is 41k for pessat guys.

There's also the distinction award for people who got gpa>7.75. It was for 1k last year this year I am not sure about the amount

20%+20% = 40% of sem fees.

>What a gimmick lol

I agree XD
